channel.title: [PI] How can I add walking emotes and attacks that are far away?
channel.description:
Hey, I'm using the project insanity base and I am trying to add the avatars (Strength/Range/Mage) I have successfully added the attack, death and block emotes but where can I add the emotes for walking?
Also, when I'm fighting the avatars that use long range attacks then have to be right next to me? I'm pretty new to coding so don't yell at me for being a Noob, I know I am already :)
Also, when I attack an avatar and try to lure it behind a tree, it just walks through the tree as if it isnt there?
If you have any answers to those questions, I would be very grateful :)

item.title: [PI] How can I add walking emotes and attacks that are far away?
item.dc:creator: @totalystylin1 totalystylin1
item.description:
@totalystylin1 wrote:

this is on how to add the walking

go to your player.java and declare this

then, go to your combatassistant.java and search

and under that declare this

then, search for

and under that, you can start makeing cases. Ex:

case 18349: // rapier chaotic c.playerStandIndex = 12021; c.playerWalkIndex = 12024; c.playerRunIndex = 12023; break;

hope this helped.

credits: 100% me
